scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const u=process.env.DATABASE_URL||'';let fixed=u;if(u){const m=u.match(/^(postgresql:\/\/[^:]+:)([^@]+)(@.+)$/);if(m){let p=m[2];if(p.includes('#')&&!p.includes('%23'))p=p.replace(/#/g,'%23');if(p.includes('$')&&!p.includes('%24'))p=p.replace(/\$/g,'%24');fixed=p!==m[2]?m[1]+p+m[3]:u;}fs.writeFileSync('.env.local','DATABASE_URL='+JSON.stringify(fixed)+'\n');}" && DATABASE_URL=$(node -p "require('fs').readFileSync('.env.local','utf8').split('DATABASE_URL=')[1]?.trim()||process.env.DATABASE_URL||''") prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && next build
scripts.test:security: npm run test:checkout && npm run test:security-headers
